bug.author: moloneymb
bug.summary: NDArray String type support for working with bytes
bug.description:
I'm trying to use the built in tensorflow jpeg encoding operations to get the byte array for a particular image. I need to get back the bytes. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fsprojects/fsharp-ai-tools/blob/0cc185199a70dfa9eeef8c96cd7f5d75182d5fbd/examples/NeuralStyleTransfer.fsx#L31>https://github.com/fsprojects/fsharp-ai-tools/blob/0cc185199a70dfa9eeef8c96cd7f5d75182d5fbd/examples/NeuralStyleTransfer.fsx#L31</denchmark-link>
The img_out.ToByteArray() is not implemented for this type and img_out.Data() returns a string that is too short to be the expected byte array.

comments.comment: Closing it as bytes type works now
